text: tatha allaah kee ibaadat (vandana) karo, kisee cheez ko usaka saajhee na banao tatha maata-pita, sameepavartiyon, anaathon, nirdhanon, sameep aur door ke padosee, yaatra ke saathee, yaatri aur apane daas daasiyon ke saath upakaar karo. nihsandeh allaah usase prem nahin karata, jo abhimaanee ahankaaree[1] ho
